articles.author: Kaitlyn Monnin
articles.title: Atlanta Braves News: Braves atop East, MLB rule changes, and more - Battery Power
articles.description: Finally alone in first place after the Mets lost to the Marlins again and the Braves were victorious over the Mariners. The Mets loss combined with the Braves win gives Atlanta a half-game advantage in the East. Plus, news and notes from around the league.
articles.content: The Atlanta Braves have sole possession of the NL East for the first time this season after defeating the Seattle Mariners6-4 at T-Mobile Park on Friday night. Charlie Morton got the start and lasted… [+1371 chars]
